Philip Elder MCTS 
Senior Technical Architect

metadata.topic: RE: [ntsysadmin] Thanks, merry Christmas and so llong
metadata.subject: [patchmanagement] RE: [ntsysadmin] Thanks, merry Christmas and so llong
metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from philipelder@mpecsinc.ca. Learn why this is
important [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
Merry Christmas too you too and many blessings for your retirement! 😊 
Philip Elder MCTS 
Senior Technical Architect 
Microsoft High Availability MVP 
E-mail: PhilipElder@mpecsinc.ca 
Phone: +1 (780) 458-2028 
Web: www.mpecsinc.com 
Blog: blog.mpecsinc.com 
Twitter: Twitter.com/MPECSInc 
Skype: MPECSInc. 
Please note: Although we may sometimes respond to email, text and phone calls
instantly at all hours of the day, our regular business hours are 8:00 AM - 5:00
PM, Monday thru Friday. 
-----Original Message-----
From: 'Glen Johnson' via ntsysadmin <ntsysadmin@googlegroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2023 10:45
To: ntsysadmin@googlegroups.com; patchmanagement@googlegroups.com
Subject: [ntsysadmin] Thanks, merry Christmas and so llong 
Greetings. 
Today is my last work day as network manager, IT coordinator and general tech
person at Virginia Highlands Community College where I have spent the past 40
years.  I will officially retire on December 31 and am looking forward to other
adventures. 
I've been a member of the ntsysadmin list longer that I can think about (my
oldest saved email, a joke, from that list is dated 2006) and the patch
management list for several years also. 
I wanted to take a second to express a heart felt THANK YOU to all that
participate in both of these most helpful lists.  You have been an invaluable
part of making my career in IT a success. Thank you for sharing your knowledge,
advice and most of all, your time.  I can't imagine being able to do half of
what I did without this great resource. 
Merry Christmas to those of you that choose to celebrate this and best wishes to
everyone. 
May patch Tuesdays be calm and all your systems run smoothly over the coming
years. 
Take care and so long. 
Glen. 
--
Link: https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/patchmanagement/ed9994bfa08d47beb18c77d61eba2317%40MPECSInc.Ca
